Description: Gretsch Cherry Firebird Bo Diddley Electromatic Guitar Gretsch Bo Diddley Electromatic square guitar in Cherry Firebird red. The guitar is in good used condition, it has a few dings in the finish, the worst being the bottom right corner, it looks like the guitar may have been dropped on the corner causing the finish and binding to chip off. Other then the pictured chips the guitar is in nice condition and plays well. The neck is straight and the frets are in good condition. Please feel free to ask any questions.
